item.title: [436] Doom The Dark Ages Review
item.description:
Review from someone who actually played it on Nightmare unlike 99% of this board who doesn't play anything.

POSITIVES
>Game is NOT slow, far faster than 2016 and can definitely be just as chaotic as Eternal
>Gameplay is fun once you get used to it
>Exploration is rewarding
>No weapon mastery skills, instead they just give golden skins now, which is better for replayability
>Twice as many weapons as any Doom game
>Possibly the most enemy variety of any game in the series
>Weapons are mostly fairly balanced
>Easily has the best bosses of any Doom game
>Mech/dragon gimmick levels are okay and very few and far inbetween so they don't overstay their welcome

NEGATIVES
>Extremely underwhelming soundtrack, not a single memorable song
>Weapon swapping is too slow
>No fast travel for secrets after you clear a level
>Basic shotgun is far better than the super shotgun
>Shield runes and melee weapons are very imbalanced. The last melee weapon you get far outclasses the other two and same with the last shield rune you get being leagues better than the others

Overall pretty good and close to Eternal. I'd give it an 8/10.

Original filename: Games_Poster_for_the_new_computer_game_DOOM__The_Dark_Ages__2024_173944_1.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [274] /pcbg/ - PC Building General
item.description:
>UPGRADE & BUILD ADVICE
Post build list or current specs including MONITOR: https://pcpartpicker.com/
Provide specific use cases (e.g. 4K editing, high FPS gaming)
State budget and COUNTRY or you will not be helped

>NEWS
RTX 5060, RX 9060 XT, and Arc B770 expected with Computex

>12VHPWR
If a 12VHPWR connector is not fully seated in its socket, the connection can melt.
Do not use aftermarket cables or adapters.

>Intel Raptor Lake / RPL Refresh
Instability reported with 13th and 14th gen, i5 K SKUs and above (incl non-K). Update BIOS and apply Intel Baseline settings. Avoid purchases.

>CPUS
HTPC(4K60)/Web Browsing: i3 12100T
Gaming: R5 9600X; budget: i5 13400; eXtreme: R7 7800X3D
Multicore: Ultra 7 265K; budget: Ultra 5 235; destitute: i5 13400
>Avoid iGPU-less CPUs
>Existing AM4 board with an old chip? Consider a Zen 3 CPU

>GRAPHICS CARDS (@MSRP)
1080p: RTX 3060 12 GB / RTX 4060; ultra budget: used RTX 2060 Super
1440p: RTX 5070; RT: RTX 5070 Ti
2160p: RTX 5080; budget: RTX 5070 Ti
RX 9070 XT: reasonable if at least 33% cheaper than an RTX 5070 Ti or close to price of RTX 5070
Amateur production: RTX 3060 12GB, RTX 5060 Ti 16GB, used RTX 3090, used RTX 4090, RTX 5090

>RAM
DDR4: Zen3/AM4 - 2x 16GB 3600 MT/s CL18; for locked "non-K" 12th/13th/LGA1700 - 2x 16GB 3200 MT/s CL16
DDR5: Zen4/AM5 - 2x 16GB 6000 MT/s CL30; for Core Ultra/LGA1851 - 2x 16GB 6400MT/s CL32

>COOLERS
Thermalright Phantom Spirit (or variant), Thermaltake Frozen Prism

>PSUS
A new PSU should be ATX 3.1 compliant
Aim for 50-75% PSU utilization at full system load
https://hwbusters.com/best_picks/best-atxv3-pcie5-ready-psus-picks-hardware-busters/

>SSDS
WD SN5000 2 TB, Samsung 990 Pro 2 TB
Avoid: cheapest NVMe SSDs
https://ssd.borecraft.com/

>MOTHERBOARDS
Good power delivery is required for Intel CPUs like the i5 13600K and above
Generally don't pair a K CPU with a B mobo chipset

>GAMING MONITORS
AOC Q27G3XMN, MSI MPG 321URX
https://pcpartpicker.com/user/pcbg/saved/dP3v4D

Prev: >>105258875

item.title: [301] /co/ General Drawthread
item.description:
>Provide References for all requested characters and keep them to one image/post
>Keep requests /co/ related and keep them concise.
>General OC discussion belongs in "Work on your art" and the Donut Steel threads.
>However, OC requests are allowed as long as they aren't /trash/ material or fanfiction. If it's not /coc/ you must provide a link to the comic or cartoon.
>Be patient and take it easy! Don't forget to check the booru to see if your request was filled.
>Drawfriends, don't hold back.
>If a post breaks the rules, DO report and hide it. DON'T respond to it.
>Keep art critique short, otherwise take it to the Batman thread.
>No one is entitled to a request delivery.
>Don't bump or "second", "third", etc. requests. They eat up the post limit.
>No spam.
>Don't fight spam with spam.
>No begging.
>No AI deliveries, no AI discussion. Take them where they're wanted.
>To make the new Drawthread, wait for page 10 at bump limit.
>Have fun!

>Collection of Deliveries:
https://co.llection.pics/

>Drawfriends Gallery List:
rentry.org/txf8t

NSFW deliveries and requests should be posted in:
>>>/aco/drawthread
or
>>>/i/795305

item.title: [ 53] The experts agree: Democrats gaslight Democrats
item.description:
The experts now agree that the "cheap fakes" were real and Democrat experts were gaslighting the American public about biden's mental state during his presidency.
Normal people saw it, it was obvious, but now Democrats also agree that Biden is senile since the experts tell them that it's ok to think that
https://www.nytimes.com/2025/05/13/us/politics/biden-book-takeaways.html
A Book Points to Biden’s Decline and Democrats’ Cowardice: 6 Takeaways
The book, “Original Sin,” describes how Mr. Biden’s aides quashed concerns about his age.

A forthcoming book that promises explosive new details on former President Joseph R. Biden Jr.’s mental and physical decline while in the White House has revived the subject of how his aides and top Democrats handled his decision to run for re-election.
The book, “Original Sin,” by Jake Tapper of CNN and Alex Thompson of Axios, chronicles how Mr. Biden’s advisers stomped out discussion of his age-related limitations, including internal concerns of aides, external worries of Democratic allies and scrutiny by journalists. Mr. Biden had long been gaffe-prone, but as he forgot familiar names and faces and showed his physical frailty, the authors write, aides wrapped him in a protective political cocoon.

Jake Tapper and Axios' Alex Thompson paints a damning portrait of then-President Joe Biden during the 2024 election, depicting a president with diminished physical and mental faculties that aides and advisers concealed from the public.

item.title: [ 43] Amphibia
item.description:
3 years ago the most amazing and bittersweet finale a cartoon could have ever had aired. Cementing itself as the best cartoon of the century. It's sad we'll probably never have something that comes close to the emotional impact this had. And even after 3 years of it's conclusion, a complementary book and artbook. The world of Amphibia is still on demand, as a new comic series was announced not long ago. What else could the future bring for this franchise?

item.title: [ 41] /tcg/ Trading Card Game General
item.description:
From Below Edition

>I want to learn the game, where do I begin?
Download PTCGL at https://tcg.pokemon.com/en-us/tcgl
The game has a quick tutorial and a bunch of decent decks to get you started against other beginners or against the AI. Some of those decks are very close to meta too. You can also go to your local game store and see if people are playing Pokémon.

>I know how to play, how do I make my own deck?
You have a decent beginner's guide at https://www.justinbasil.com/guide
There's also the old /tcg/ guide at https://imgur.com/a/W4NkOu6
After that, look up meta decks and try to reverse engineer them to see how things work.

>Where to find meta decks?
For big irl events, go to https://limitlesstcg.com/decks
For online events, go to https://play.limitlesstcg.com/decks?game=PTCG
For japanese events, go to https://pokecabook.com/archives/1417

Previous thread: >>57778424

Old /tcg/ pastebin: https://pastebin.com/Ge95YuMA

item.title: [217] /nrl/ - Rugby League General - Womens State of Origin - Game 2
item.description:
Do or die edition

WOMENS STATE OF ORIGIN
New South Wales v Queensland
7:45pm AEST on Ch 9 and 9NOW
Replay 10:00pm AEST on Fox and Kayo
Allianz Stadium, Sydney
1.41-2.93
>New South Wales have the chance to wrap up the Women’s State of Origin series in Sydney - while defending champs Queensland look to force a decider.Coach John Strange has retained the same starting 17 that got the job done against Queensland in their series opener at Suncorp Stadium. The only change to the extended squad seesSydney Roosters winger Brydie Parker, who is yet to make her debut for NSW, named in the No.20 jersey alongside fellow reserves Titans forward Shaylee Bent and Knights hooker Olivia Higgins. Kirra Dibb drops out of the squad.For QLD, Chelsea Lendarduzzi has been drafted into the 17 for Game Two, with coach Tahnee Norris looking to bolster her forward pack who were outmuscled in the opening game.The Broncos forward will come on to the bench, with Destiny Brill reverting to the reserves in 19. Winger Jasmine Peters failed to finish Game One with a head knock, but the timing of the matches means she will be free to playing after clearing her return to play concussion protocols. Halfback Ali Brigginshaw and fullback Tamika Upton will co-captain the side.
NSW 1-12 2.80
NSW 13+ 2.60
QLD 1-12 3.90
QLD 13+ 8.50
NSW -6.5 1.90 QLD +6.5 1.90

Original filename: Do or die.jpg

item.title: [ 87] The Reds (still) want to ban porn
item.description:
https://gizmodo.com/gop-senator-introduces-bill-to-make-all-porn-a-federal-crime-following-project-2025-playbook-2000600994

"Last year, the rightwing think-tank the Heritage Foundation launched Project 2025, which laid out much of the policy blueprint for the current Trump administration. One of the project’s espoused goals was to permanently criminalize all pornography. Now, a Republican senator with kind words for Trump has introduced a bill that would do just that.

Senator Mike Lee (R-Utah) recently introduced the Interstate Obscenity Definition Act (IODA), which would effectively criminalize all pornography nationwide by legally redefining what it means to be obscene. For years, “obscenity” has been all but a defunct legal category that narrowly defines speech that remains unprotected by the First Amendment. Lee would explode this legal category, expanding it to encompass virtually all visual representations of sex."

Original filename: Untitled.gif
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [131] Trump just brought a group of white South Africans to the US as refugees.
item.description:
https://apnews.com/article/south-africa-refugees-explainer-afrikaner-c350d525572ce4b9e4ec80a7a549c133

CAPE TOWN, South Africa (AP) — The Trump administration brought a small number of white South Africans to the United States as refugees Monday. It says it’s the start of a larger relocation effort for members of the minority Afrikaner group who are being persecuted by their Black-led government because of their race.

The 59 South Africans had their applications fast-tracked by the U.S. after President Donald Trump announced the relocation program in February. He said Monday that white Afrikaner farmers are facing a “genocide” in their homeland, an allegation strongly denied by the South African government.

Original filename: 1481782389546.gif
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 38] Even Trump’s closest supporters can’t pretend he is not corrupt and accepting bribes.
item.description:
https://thehill.com/homenews/5295240-laura-loomer-criticizes-trump-qatari-gift/amp/

Conservative provocateur Laura Loomer, who has been a staunch supporter of President Trump, called him out over the weekend as the White House prepares to receive a $400 million Boeing jet from the Qatari government.

“I love President Trump. I would take a bullet for him,” Loomer wrote in a post on the social platform X. “But, I have to call a spade a spade. We cannot accept a $400 million ‘gift’ from jihadists in suits.”

“This is really going to be such a stain on the admin if this is true,” Loomer said.

“I’m so disappointed.”

item.title: [296] /mug/ - manchester united general
item.description:
Everyone take a deep breath and relax. The situation may seem grim right now, but there's no point in getting carried away and being overly critical. We've faced some strong opponent in the recent weeks and while Amorim is still new in the role it would be naive to expect some sort of miraculous overnight change.i know 17 league losses and zero back-to-back wins all year are diabolical but we're still within arms-reach of CL football next season, EL is pretty much guaranteed in the bag if we can beat Spurs since we'll be facing either Spurs or Spurs in the final. We've been unlucky, yes, and at times we've been sloppy - but that's no reason to write-off the season. Amorim is still settling into the role and our performances have been getting better every game - or have we already forgotten that just a few months ago we beat City AT THE ETIHAD? or stealing a point AT ANFIELD? It's clear that we perform on big games so It's not all doom and gloom, and it's not over till the fat lady sings.This transfer window we need to be ruthless. No more finished players on high wages, no more hype transfers, no more being retarded with contracts, just cold hard statistics and data based recruitments which have worked wonders for brighton and bournemouth. Amorim's project has only just begone and the only way it can possibly succeed is with the backing of the board and the fans. We simply have no other option than to stick by our gaffer, our team needs our support now more than ever before.It's us against the world - and I say bring it on. You don't f*ck with The Red Devils.
>Some helpful links to numb the pain:
https://www.instagram.com/garnacho7/
https://jlingzofficial.com/
https://www.redcafe.com/
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/suicide/

Original filename: 1659964793702676.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [145] /jpg/ - Japan General
item.description:
Vending Machine Edition

ー How do I travel by public transportation? ー
Use Google Maps within cities, install the Jorudan or Navitime app for intercity travel

ー What should I see in <place>? ー
https://www.wikivoyage.org/
https://www.japan-guide.com/
https://www.jnto.go.jp/
>Solid general guides - sights, sample itineraries, pre-travel considerations, etc
https://www.google.com/maps/d/edit?mid=1fmfaySQHmojbRGKWCwRecq6Ln1Bb2Xdh&ll=35.67928012473078%2C139.68638283648374&z=12
*You should check on google if a place is still in business before you plan to visit it*

ーJR Passー
Since JR has adjusted the prices for the pass, not really worth it anymore, unless you want to travel by train very extensively. You can plug in your itinerary in the links below and compare prices to the JR Pass.
>https://japantravel.navitime.com/en/area/jp/route/
>https://world.jorudan.co.jp/mln/en/
With the increased price of the JR Pass, local train passes might be good deals now.
>https://www.japan-guide.com/e/e2357.html

New prices starting May 2024
>7 day Pass: ¥50,000
>14 day Pass: ¥80,000
>21 day Pass: ¥100,000
https://www.japan-guide.com/railpass/

ーInfo on Degeneracy ー
READ THE INFO LISTED HERE. STOP TALKING ABOUT IT IN THE THREAD.

>https://chn.cityheaven.net/
>https://rockitrisingsun.com
>https://paradise-tokyo.net
>https://hentaitokyo.com
>https://tokyoadultguide.com/

item.title: [ 50] Bear Deterrance/Defense
item.description:
I’m moving to an area where there are grizzlies, and I plan to do a lot of hiking. People seem pretty divided on how to handle bear country. Some say that they’re not that big a deal and all you need is bear spray, proper food storage, maybe some bells, etc. Then other people say that bear spray is useless and you should be carrying a large caliber firearm. What’s the /out/ist take on this?

item.title: [ 54] Hey voyagers, The sticky probably needs to be updated, I'll keep the thread
item.description:
Hey voyagers,

The sticky probably needs to be updated, I'll keep the thread open for suggestions:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

/trv/ is a slow board, so don't expect immediate responses. CHECK THE CATALOG – you might find threads already discussing topics you're interested in.

Before asking for suggestions, tell /trv/ about your:
>Budget
>Interests
>Level of understanding of the local language(s)
This makes it easier to give quality advice. Of course, keep your posts travel related.

For all other matters:
General culture questions >>>/int/
Politics discussion >>>/pol/
Transportation discussion >>>/n/
Outdoors-related discussion >>>/out/

For more information about safety, planning and other miscellaneous topics, check out the pastebin:

GENERAL INFO:
https://pastebin.com/yR1SAr3s

Note: Discussions of prostitution or sex tourism are not permitted on /trv/.
